name: Sniper Skill Duck Hunting
description:
Sniper Skill Duck Hunting is a first person shooting game with efficient weapon control and eye-catching 3D graphics and sound effects. Enjoy duck hunting with realistic animations. Enjoy the most realistic hunting experience ever.
Features---
First person 3D Shooting
Efficient Weapon control
Beautiful game graphics and sounds
Stunning graphics & sound effects
Fun, challenging and addictive gameplay
Real time Duck Hunting with animations
Easy to play, hard to master game
